name: Kalista
title: the Spear of Vengeance
lore: A specter of wrath and retribution, Kalista is the undying spirit of vengeance, an armored nightmare summoned from the Shadow Isles to hunt deceivers and traitors. The betrayed may cry out in blood to be avenged, but Kalista only answers those willing to pay with their very souls. Those who become the focus of Kalista's wrath should make their final peace, for any pact sealed with this grim hunter can only end with the cold, piercing fire of her soul-spears.
blurb: A specter of wrath and retribution, Kalista is the undying spirit of vengeance, an armored nightmare summoned from the Shadow Isles to hunt deceivers and traitors. The betrayed may cry out in blood to be avenged, but Kalista only answers those willing...
allytips: Rend is a valuable last hitting aid, since its cooldown resets if it kills a target.
Entering a move order once to trigger Martial Poise will not clear Kalista's basic attack target.
Due to her passive, Kalista's Movement Speed is effectively increased by Attack Speed.
enemytips: Kalista's mobility is dependent upon attacking. This means it is low when she is outside of her attack range and that Attack Speed slows reduce the amount of distance she can cover in an engagement.
Kalista cannot cancel her basic attack wind up. While she is very mobile, this offers a window to land spells on her if you anticipate when she will begin attacking.
If you can break line of sight from Kalista, including through brush, her basic attacks will miss you, falling harmlessly to the ground.

riot_spell_q.name: Pierce
riot_spell_q.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Hurl a fast but narrow spear that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E).

If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.

riot_spell_w.name: Sentinel
riot_spell_w.description:
Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista and her Oathsworn both basic attack the same target, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage. {{ e7 }} second cooldown per target.

Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions spotted are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 3 laps.

Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Rend
riot_spell_e.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Passive: Kalista's spears pierce their target, lingering for 4 seconds.

Active: Rip the spears from nearby targets, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Each additional spear deals {{ e9 }} (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage.

If Rend kills at least one target, its cooldown is reset and it refunds {{ e8 }} mana.

Rend deals {{ epicmonsterdamagemod*100 }}% damage to Epic Monsters.

riot_spell_r.name: Fate's Call
riot_spell_r.description: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable and pacified.

The Oathsworn may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit and knocking all enemies in a small radius back.

Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1100 units for her to cast this ability.

riot_spell_i.name: Martial Poise
riot_spell_i.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Martial Poise
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.
wikia_skill_i1.description:
{{sbc|Martial Poise:}} '''Kalista's''' [[basic attack]]s have special interactions:
* Use only {{as|90% attack damage}}.
* Miss if she loses {{tip|sight}} of her target before they hit.
* Cannot cancel their wind-up, but can select a new target within range.
* Make her {{tip|dash|lunge}} in the target direction after issuing a movement command during a wind-up or right after casting {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}}. The lunge distance scales with her boots tier.
wikia_skill_i1.description2:
The wind-up while dashing is only reduced by {{fd|0.66}}% per {{sti|{{as|1% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} compared to the standard 1% per 1%.

Additionally, '''Kalista''' begins the game with {{ii|The Black Spear}}, a unique item.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
[[File:Kalista-Martial-Poise-Indicator.png|Martial Poise's dash indicator|right]]
* {{tip|Critical strike}} damage is reduced to 90%.
* ''The Black Spear'' can not be used on [[Champion summoned units|decoys]]. Targeting those will put the item on a 10 seconds cooldown.
* The dash speed is affected by movement speed modifiers and so it will be reduced by {{tip|Slow}}.
* {{Pending for test}}: Dash range values using {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Pierce
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' hurls a fast and narrow spear, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to the first enemy hit.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If ''Pierce'' kills its target, the spear continues onward, transferring all of the dead victim's {{ai|Rend|Kalista}} stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum distance.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Sentinel
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Passive - Soul-Marked:}} While '''Kalista''' and her {{ii|The Black Spear|Oathsworn}} are linked, their basic attacks<!-- and Kalista's Pierce, please check in-game Kalista Q description--> apply a ''Soul-Mark'' to their targets.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: If both ''Soul-Marks'' are applied within 2 seconds, the target takes {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} (capped against non-champions), and cannot be ''Soul-Marked'' for 10 seconds. ''Soul-Mark'' deals 75 minimum damage to {{tip|minions}} and executes them if they're below {{as|{{sti|health|125 health}}}}.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling2: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|5 to 15}}% of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|100 to 200}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description3: '''Kalista''' stores a charge of ''Sentinel'' periodically, up to a maximum of 2 stored at once.
wikia_skill_w1.description4: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' summons a ''Sentinel'' by her side to {{tip|sight|scout}} {{tt|the target area|5000 range}}.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
<!-- If pierce kills the target by soul-marked added damage, will it continue? -->
* ''Soul-Marked'' displays a mark above the target hit by ''Kalista'' or her {{ii|The Black Spear|Oathsworn}} ally's basic attacks.
** This mark resembles half a spearhead and, if either attacks the target after the other has done so, the spearhead will assemble itself and ''Soul-Marked's'' bonus damage will trigger.
* ''Soul-Marked's'' bonus damage is credited to ''Kalista'' and will benefit from both her [[magic penetration]] and her [[spell effects]].
** If her {{ii|The Black Spear|Oathsworn}} ally scores a kill using ''Soul-Marked's'' bonus damage they will get a message stating 'Kill Secured' in place of the usual gold pop-up (the gold itself is credited to ''Kalista'').
* The ''Sentinel's'' vision grants assists and/or kills (if the spotted enemy champion dies shortly after being so).

wikia_skill_e1.name: Rend
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kalista's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Pierce|Kalista}} each lodge a spear in her target, stacking up to 254 times. The stack of spears remains for 4 seconds while untouched.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' rips all lodged spears from nearby enemies, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for 2 seconds, with spears beyond the first dealing reduced damage. ''Rend'' deals 50% reduced damage to epic [[monster]]s.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling2:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|20 to 60}} {{as|(+ 60% AD)}}|Damage per Additional Spear|{{pp|5|notooltip=true|10+3*(x-1)+x*(x-1)/2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|60*0.33|60*0.3958 to 60*0.5833 4}}% AD)}}}}
{{st|Slow|{{ap|25 to 45}}%}}
wikia_skill_e1.description3: ''Rend'' resets its {{sti|cooldown}} and refunds {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} if it kills at least one target.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* A fully-stacked ''Rend'' will deal {{pp|5|notooltip=true|20+10*(x-1)+(10+3*(x-1)+x*(x-1)/2)*253}} {{as|(+ {{ap|60*(1+0.33*253)|60*(1+0.3958*253) to 60*(1+0.5833*253)}}% AD)}} physical damage.
* The cooldown will reset if the target dies but has a revival effect (e.g. {{cai|Chronoshift|Zilean}}).
* {{sbc|Possible Bug:}} If ''Rend'' is used against a {{ci|Sion}} under the effects of {{ai|Glory in Death|Sion}}, the cooldown will reset even if it doesn't kill the {{ci|Sion}}.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Fate's Call
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to Launch toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kalista''' invokes her {{ii|The Black Spear|link}}, retrieving her ''Oathsworn'' and placing them in {{tip|stasis}} for 4 seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: '''Kalista's''' ''Oathsworn'' can emerge to a target location, stopping at the first enemy hit, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} all surrounding enemies and landing themselves at their basic attack range relative to the target hit.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* ''Fate's Call'' will wait for the ''Oathsworn'' ally to finish their channels before holding them.
* The ''Oathsworn'' ally is {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|invisibility|invisible}} so long as they remain held by ''Fate's Call'', represented by a light over ''Kalista's'' head until they dash.
** '''Kalista's''' death does not interrupt ''Fate's Call''.
